name: Archaeological Find
description: Ancient ruins or artifacts are discovered in your territory.
special: If you have Knowledge & Magic structures, gain an untyped bonus equal to the tier to the check.

failure.msg: Minor artifacts; gain 1 Resource of your choice

name: Assassination Attempt
description: Someone attempts to kill one of your leaders.
special: If the target has a bodyguard or is in a fortified location, gain +2 to the check.

criticalSuccess.msg: Assassin captured; gain information about enemies

criticalFailure.msg: Leader wounded; +{unrest}, that PC cannot take a Kingdom Action this turn

name: Bandit Activity
description: Bandits establish a camp and begin raiding travelers.
special: Once per event, you can try to recruit the bandits (Diplomacy only) - on success, gain a free Garrison.

modifierTemplate.name: Unresolved: Bandit Activity
modifierTemplate.description: Each turn: lose 1 Resource and +1 Unrest (Failure result). Bandits entrench themselves and grow stronger.

criticalSuccess.msg: Bandits defeated or recruited; +{gold} from their loot, **event ends**

failure.msg: Raids continue; lose 1 Resource this turn, +{unrest}

name: Boomtown
description: A settlement experiences sudden, dramatic growth.
special: While active gain +1 untyped bonus to all Crafting and Society checks in that settlement

name: Cult Activity
description: A dangerous cult begins operating in secret within your kingdom.
special: Settlements with a Faith & Nature structure gain an untyped bonus equal to the tier to defeat the cult Settlements with a Crime & Intrigue structure gain an untyped bonus equal to the tier to locate the cult

modifierTemplate.name: Unresolved: Cult Activity
modifierTemplate.description: Each turn: +1 Unrest (Failure result). Cult recruits more members and spreads influence.

success.msg: If not located: cult found. If located: cult defeated, **event ends**

criticalFailure.msg: Cult grows stronger; +{unrest}, spreads to another settlement

name: Demand Expansion
description: Citizens demand the kingdom claim new territory.
special: If you expand your territory this turn (claim a new hex), automatically succeed and event ends.

modifierTemplate.name: Unresolved: Demand Expansion
modifierTemplate.description: Each turn: +1 Unrest (Failure result). Citizens grow increasingly frustrated with lack of expansion.

name: Demand Structure
description: Citizens demand that a specific structure be built.
special: If you build a structure of the demanded type, the event ends (automatic success).

modifierTemplate.name: Unresolved: Demand Structure
modifierTemplate.description: Each turn: +1 Unrest (or pay 1 Gold concession). Protests continue and grow more organized.

failure.msg: Protests continue; +{unrest}, or pay 1 Gold as concessions

name: Diplomatic Overture
description: A neighboring kingdom reaches out to establish or improve diplomatic relations.
location: Choose or roll for a neighboring kingdom
special: - If you have Civic & Governance structures, gain an untyped bonus equal to the tier to the check - Cannot establish Helpful relations without appropriate diplomatic capacity (see Diplomatic Relations rules) - If relations are already Helpful, critical success grants 2 Gold instead

criticalSuccess.msg: Relations improve by one step; if now Helpful, +{gold} and {unrest}

success.msg: Relations improve by one step (max Friendly without diplomatic structures)

failure.msg: No change in relations; minor diplomatic friction

name: Drug Den
description: An illicit drug trade threatens to corrupt your settlement.
special: If the settlement has Crime & Intrigue structures, gain an untyped bonus equal to the tier to checks.

modifierTemplate.name: Unresolved: Drug Den
modifierTemplate.description: Each turn: +1 Unrest, -1 Gold (Failure result). Drug trade expands unchecked.

success.msg: Major arrests, convert 1 unrest to imprisoned unrest; **event ends**

modifiers.name: Major arrests, convert 1 unrest to imprisoned unrest

criticalFailure.msg: Major drug crisis; +{unrest}, one structure becomes damaged.

name: Economic Surge
description: Trade and productivity boom throughout your kingdom.
location: Kingdom-wide (check in capital or largest settlement)
special: Commerce structures provide an untyped bonus equal to the tier to checks.

name: Festive Invitation
description: A neighboring kingdom invites your leaders to a grand festival.
special: If you bring at least 1 Resource as a gift, gain +2 to the check.

criticalSuccess.msg: Great success; Gold equal to Resources brought +1, {unrest}

success.msg: Pleasant visit; Gold equal to Resources brought

name: Feud
description: Rival factions from different settlements escalate their conflict.
location: Two settlements (if less than 2, no effect)
special: pf2e-reignmaker.events.feud.special

modifierTemplate.name: Unresolved: Feud
modifierTemplate.description: Each turn: +1 Unrest (Failure result). Feud escalates and disrupts trade between settlements.

criticalSuccess.msg: Feud ended, rivals become allies; +{gold}, **event ends**

criticalFailure.msg: Private war erupts; +{unrest}, a random structure becomes damaged in one of the settlements

name: Food Shortage
description: Disease, weather, or pests destroy agricultural production.

modifierTemplate.name: Unresolved: Food Shortage
modifierTemplate.description: First turn: lose 6 Food, +1 Unrest. Subsequent turns: lose 2 Food, +1 Unrest per turn as shortage continues.

criticalSuccess.msg: Crisis averted; lose 2 Food this turn, **event ends**

success.msg: Shortage controlled; lose 4 Food this turn, **event ends**

failure.msg: Severe shortage; lose 6 Food this turn, +{unrest}

criticalFailure.msg: Famine threatens; lose 8 Food this turn, +{unrest}

name: Food Surplus
description: Exceptional harvests provide abundant food.

expires.message: First turn: +1 Gold (Failure result). Second turn: Spoilage begins, +1 Unrest per turn as surplus rots.

name: Good Weather
description: Perfect weather conditions boost morale and productivity.
special: pf2e-reignmaker.events.good-weather.special

expires.message: First turn: +2 Food (automatic). Second turn: Weather changes (Failure result, event ends).

name: Grand Tournament
description: A martial competition draws competitors from across the realm.
special: If you have Performance & Culture or Military & Training structures, gain an untyped bonus equal to their tier to checks.

name: Immigration
description: New settlers arrive seeking homes in your kingdom.

expires.message: First turn: Few settlers stay (Failure result). Second turn: Unintegrated immigrants cause tensions, +1 Unrest per turn.

criticalSuccess.msg: Major influx; +{gold}, +2 untyped bonus to Build Structure actions this turn

success.msg: Steady immigration; +{gold}, +1 untyped bonus to Build Structure actions this turn

failure.msg: Few settlers stay; no significant effect

name: Inquisition
description: Zealots mobilize against a minority group or belief.
special: If you have Faith & Nature structures, gain an untyped bonus equal to the tier to Religion checks.

modifierTemplate.name: Unresolved: Inquisition
modifierTemplate.description: Each turn: +2 Unrest (Failure result). Zealots continue persecution unchecked.

name: Justice Prevails
description: Authorities catch a notorious criminal or resolve a major injustice.
special: If you have Civic & Governance structures, gain an untyped bonus equal to the tier to the check.

name: Land Rush
description: Settlers attempt to claim wilderness at the kingdom's border.
special: These hexes are claimed without requiring the normal Claim Hex action or resources. Choose adjacent unclaimed hexes.

criticalSuccess.msg: Settlers successfully expand the kingdom; **gain {hex} hexes**

name: Local Disaster
description: Fire, flood, or structural collapse strikes a settlement.
special: Settlements with Fortifications increase the result by one degree of success.

failure.msg: Major damage; one structure becomes damaged, +{unrest}

name: Magical Discovery
description: A powerful magical site or artifact is discovered in your kingdom.
special: If you have Knowledge & Magic structures, gain an untyped bonus equal to the tier to check.

criticalSuccess.msg: Major magical boon; gain a free Tier 1 magical structure or upgrade an existing structure to the next tier

criticalFailure.msg: Magical disaster; +{unrest}, one random magical structure becomes damaged in an accident

name: Military Exercises
description: Your kingdom conducts large-scale military training maneuvers.
location: Settlement with military structures or the largest settlement
special: If you have Military & Training structures, gain an untyped bonus equal to their tier to the check.

criticalSuccess.msg: Elite forces trained; +2 untyped bonus to military kingdom actions this turn, {unrest}

criticalFailure.msg: Training accident; +{unrest}, one military structure becomes damaged

name: Monster Attack
description: A dangerous creature attacks a settlement or travellers.
special: If the settlement has Fortifications, gain an untyped bonus equal to the tier to checks.

success.msg: Monster driven away; no negative effect

failure.msg: Monster causes damage; one structure becomes damaged, +{unrest}

criticalFailure.msg: Monster rampages; one structure becomes destroyed, +{unrest}

name: Natural Disaster
description: Earthquake, tornado, wildfire, or severe flooding strikes the kingdom.
location: a random worksite and 2 adjacent hexes (roll 1d6)
special: Can spend 1 Gold per hex before rolling to gain +2 to that check (emergency supplies). If one of the adjacent hexes has a settlement, treat it as a Local Disaster for that settlement.

criticalSuccess.msg: Minimal damage; citizens impressed by response, {unrest}

success.msg: Some damage; lose 1 Resource from this hex

failure.msg: Major damage; lose all production from the hex this turn, +{unrest}

criticalFailure.msg: Devastating losses. Any worksites are removed from the hex, +{unrest}

modifiers.name: Devastating losses. Any worksites are removed from the hex

name: Nature's Blessing
description: A natural wonder appears in your kingdom - rare flowers, aurora, or returning wildlife.
special: If you have Faith & Nature or Exploration & Wilderness structures, gain an untyped bonus equal to the tier to check.

name: Notorious Heist
description: A daring theft threatens your kingdom's security and reputation.
special: If you have Crime & Intrigue structures, gain an untyped bonus equal to their tier to the check. If you have no treasury or commerce structures, the thieves find nothing (automatic success).

criticalSuccess.msg: Thieves captured with stolen goods; recover losses, convert 2 Unrest to imprisoned unrest

success.msg: Thieves arrested; convert 1 Unrest to imprisoned unrest

criticalFailure.msg: Crime syndicate exposed; {gold}, +{unrest}, may trigger additional crime events

name: Pilgrimage
description: Religious pilgrims seek passage or sanctuary in your kingdom.
special: If you have Faith & Nature structures, gain an untyped bonus equal to the tier to check.

name: Plague
description: Disease spreads rapidly through your settlements.
special: Settlements with Medicine & Healing or Faith & Nature structures gain an untyped bonus equal to the tier to checks. Bonuses from different structure types stack.

modifierTemplate.name: Unresolved: Plague
modifierTemplate.description: Each turn: +1 Unrest, -2 Gold, spreads to connected settlements (Failure result). Disease continues unchecked.

failure.msg: Plague spreads; +{unrest}, {gold}, spreads to a settlement connected by a road

criticalFailure.msg: Devastating outbreak; +{unrest}, {gold}, spreads to all settlements connected by a road

name: Public Scandal
description: A leader is implicated in an embarrassing or criminal situation.

criticalFailure.msg: Leader must lay low; +{unrest}, that PC cannot take a Kingdom Action this turn

name: Raiders
description: Armed raiders threaten settlements and trade routes.
special: Can pay 2 Gold tribute to immediately end the event (no check required). Fortifications provide an untyped bonus equal to the tier to checks.

modifierTemplate.name: Unresolved: Raiders
modifierTemplate.description: Each turn: -2 Gold, -2 Food, +1 Unrest (Failure result). Raiders continue pillaging unchecked.

criticalFailure.msg: Major raid; {gold}, {food}, +{unrest}, one structure becomes damaged

name: Remarkable Treasure
description: Explorers discover valuable resources or ancient treasure.
special: Gain +1 to the check for each mine or quarry you control (prospecting experience).

name: Scholarly Discovery
description: Researchers in your kingdom make an important academic breakthrough.
location: Settlement with knowledge structures or largest settlement
special: If you have Knowledge & Magic structures, gain an untyped bonus equal to their tier to the check.

criticalSuccess.msg: Revolutionary discovery; +{gold}, +{fame}, may build one Knowledge structure at half cost

name: Sensational Crime
description: A notorious crime captures public attention.
special: Crime & Intrigue structures provide an untyped bonus equal to their tier to checks.

name: Trade Agreement
description: Merchants propose a lucrative trade arrangement.
special: Commerce structures provide an untyped bonus equal to their tier to checks.

name: Undead Uprising
description: The dead rise from their graves to threaten the living.
special: Settlements with Faith & Nature or Knowledge & Magic structures gain an untyped bonus equal to their tier to checks.

modifierTemplate.name: Unresolved: Undead Uprising
modifierTemplate.description: Each turn: +1 Unrest, one structure damaged (Failure result). Undead continue spreading unchecked.

failure.msg: Undead spread; +{unrest}, one structure becomes damaged

criticalFailure.msg: Major outbreak; +{unrest}, one structure destroyed and another damaged

name: Visiting Celebrity
description: A famous person visits your kingdom, bringing attention and opportunity.
special: If you have Performance & Culture structures, gain an untyped bonus equal to their tier to the check.

criticalFailure.msg: Celebrity offended; +{unrest}, -2 to next celebrity event
